description: Tall hunk JJ Knight is the host of Primetime, and his ratings have been dropping. He isn’t happy that they moved his show to a later time slot, but he is determined to climb the charts again! His first guest of the night is athletic, cute Shane Jackson, and the only question he wants answered is about the size of the biggest dick he’s ever taken. Brown-haired Shane is a little shy to answer, but horny JJ whips out his massive cock so he can compare, and soon the two are fucking on live T.V! Will the ratings rise as quickly as their hung dicks?
title: Primetime - Part 1: Bareback
